short_description: layda b is a shoes & other footwear store based in zurich, switzerland.
long_description: made from finest suede and leather, designed for everyone naturally moving with elegance, independence and consciousness. back to simplicity. back to class. fine footwear handmade in italy. layda b is a fine female shoe with a precise mission: to empower authenticity for true individuality. class is a way of being. with its one-model concept of fine ideal accessoires,. layda b is addressing the restoration of balance in order to display authentic individuality in the form of true beauty. and other data protection regulations (especially the federal data protection act, fadp; cc 235.1) is layda christine (legal form sole proprietorship), pflanzschulstrasse 58, 8004 zurich, switzerland, email: info@laydab.com. the legal basis for the processing of data is art. 6 para. 1 lit. b gdpr as well as art. 31 para. 2 lit. a fadp, because a contractual relationship is established and processed with the data. it is possible to assign data, sessions and interactions across several devices to a pseudonymous user id and thus analyze a user's activities across devices.
generated_description: layda b. is a zurich-based company specializing in fine footwear. the company designs and manufactures handcrafted shoes made from high-quality suede and leather. their products are known for their elegant, minimalist aesthetic and are ideal for women. collaborates with long-standing, family-owned shoemakers in italy to ensure the highest craftsmanship standards. the company's shoes feature a pointed shape, flat heel, and stable sewn-on seams, with a focus on simplicity and individuality. aims to empower authenticity and individuality through its one-model concept of fine accessories.
generated_business_tags: authenticity empowerment | distribution approach | hotel partnership services | one-for-one model
